comprehensive_overview: NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries, and tools for high-performance computing (HPC) and scientific computing applications. It is designed to optimize performance on NVIDIA GPUs and multi-core CPUs.
core_features: Includes NVIDIA-compilers for CUDA C/C++, Fortran, and Python, along with libraries such as cuBLAS, cuFFT, cuSPARSE, and cuDNN. Provides tools for profiling, debugging, and optimizing HPC applications. Supports integration with popular HPC frameworks and workflows.
